name: Mohamed Al-Rashid
summary: Solutions Architect with 12 years of experience designing enterprise-scale systems and cloud architectures. Strong expertise in solution design, technical pre-sales, and leading architectural initiatives for Fortune 500 clients.

experience.title: Principal Solutions Architect
responsibilities: Lead architecture design for multi-cloud enterprise transformations ($10M+ projects)
Define technical strategy and roadmap for clients migrating to cloud
Conduct architecture reviews and provide recommendations on scalability and security
Mentor team of 8 solutions architects and conduct technical training
Pre-sales technical engagement with C-level executives at Fortune 500 companies
Design reference architectures for healthcare, finance, and retail industries

experience.title: Senior Solutions Architect
responsibilities: Designed cloud-native architectures on AWS and Azure for 20+ enterprise clients
Led technical discovery workshops and created solution proposals
Established architecture patterns and best practices for microservices
Collaborated with engineering teams to ensure successful implementation

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer / Tech Lead
responsibilities: Led development of billing system serving 5M+ subscribers
Architected integration layer connecting 15+ backend systems
Managed team of 6 developers and established agile practices
Reduced system downtime by 60% through architecture improvements

education.degree: Master of Science in Software Engineering
education.institution: King Fahd University of Petroleum & Minerals

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Engineering
